annotation.spannedText: We are fortunate that people in our community worked hard to get the documentary film VAXXED

classMention.mentionClass: We are fortunate that people in our community worked hard to get the documentary film VAXXED

annotation.spannedText: this is NOT an anti-vaccine film

classMention.mentionClass: this is NOT an anti-vaccine film

annotation.spannedText: We currently have the sickest nation of children ever seen before and we owe it to our children to study why

classMention.mentionClass: We currently have the sickest nation of children ever seen before and we owe it to our children to study why

annotation.spannedText: The cradle-to-grave vaccination industry is motivated because if a company gets just one vaccination on the recommended schedule, they can make up to $30 billion per year

classMention.mentionClass: The cradle-to-grave vaccination industry is motivated because if a company gets just one vaccination on the recommended schedule, they can make up to $30 billion per year

annotation.spannedText: vaccines are not classed as pharmaceutical drugs and therefore are not subject to the same testing and double-blind controlled studies as other drugs

classMention.mentionClass: vaccines are not classed as pharmaceutical drugs and therefore are not subject to the same testing and double-blind controlled studies as other drugs

annotation.spannedText: This different classification means less rigorous safety controls

classMention.mentionClass: This different classification means less rigorous safety controls

annotation.spannedText: The vaccine schedule put out by the CDC is determined rather arbitrarily

classMention.mentionClass: The vaccine schedule put out by the CDC is determined rather arbitrarily

annotation.spannedText: No studies have been done pertaining to combinations of vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: No studies have been done pertaining to combinations of vaccines

annotation.spannedText: No studies comparing vaccinated to unvaccinated populations have been done

classMention.mentionClass: No studies comparing vaccinated to unvaccinated populations have been done

annotation.spannedText: So much is missing

classMention.mentionClass: So much is missing

annotation.spannedText: while children are routinely given multiple vaccines in a day, no studies have been done to test the safety of the combination of vaccines the CDC currently recommends

classMention.mentionClass: while children are routinely given multiple vaccines in a day, no studies have been done to test the safety of the combination of vaccines the CDC currently recommends

annotation.spannedText: Their studies tend to be reactive, not proactive

classMention.mentionClass: Their studies tend to be reactive, not proactive

annotation.spannedText: when we give immunizations against, for example, measles and mumps, which are related diseases, in one shot, the results may be unpredictable

classMention.mentionClass: when we give immunizations against, for example, measles and mumps, which are related diseases, in one shot, the results may be unpredictable

annotation.spannedText: this deserves to be studied

classMention.mentionClass: this deserves to be studied

annotation.spannedText: While many recipients will be fine, many will not be

classMention.mentionClass: While many recipients will be fine, many will not be

annotation.spannedText: parents everywhere deserve transparency when it comes to vaccine data

classMention.mentionClass: parents everywhere deserve transparency when it comes to vaccine data

annotation.spannedText: Parents and pediatricians alike deserve an unbiased scientific organization that performs and analyzes studies and issues true and accurate reports on the data

classMention.mentionClass: Parents and pediatricians alike deserve an unbiased scientific organization that performs and analyzes studies and issues true and accurate reports on the data

annotation.spannedText: We should put money into the studies that have been requested over and over again by families, by organizations that serve the adversely affected populations, even by politicians

classMention.mentionClass: We should put money into the studies that have been requested over and over again by families, by organizations that serve the adversely affected populations, even by politicians

annotation.spannedText: We cannot sit idly by as we are told that “vaccines do not cause autism”

classMention.mentionClass: We cannot sit idly by as we are told that “vaccines do not cause autism”

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines do not cause autism in all children, obviously

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines do not cause autism in all children, obviously

annotation.spannedText: Until we know exactly what does cause autism, we cannot say with certainty that a vaccine or a combination of vaccines will not be the tipping point for any particular child

classMention.mentionClass: Until we know exactly what does cause autism, we cannot say with certainty that a vaccine or a combination of vaccines will not be the tipping point for any particular child

annotation.spannedText: Check out the Hear This Well campaign

classMention.mentionClass: Check out the Hear This Well campaign

annotation.spannedText: Check out VAXXED

classMention.mentionClass: Check out VAXXED

annotation.spannedText: as parents, we should have the right to make the best decisions we know how for our child

classMention.mentionClass: as parents, we should have the right to make the best decisions we know how for our child

annotation.spannedText: If we are comfortable giving single dose vaccines, those should be available

classMention.mentionClass: If we are comfortable giving single dose vaccines, those should be available

annotation.spannedText: It matters because pediatricians depend on the CDC to provide the most accurate and most recent information to them so that they can advise their patients

classMention.mentionClass: It matters because pediatricians depend on the CDC to provide the most accurate and most recent information to them so that they can advise their patients

annotation.spannedText: They deserve to have untainted information

classMention.mentionClass: They deserve to have untainted information

annotation.spannedText: They deserve to be able to offer their patients options, such as single dose vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: They deserve to be able to offer their patients options, such as single dose vaccines

annotation.spannedText: This is a slippery slope

classMention.mentionClass: This is a slippery slope

annotation.spannedText: If you’ve seen it, please share your thoughts in the comments below

classMention.mentionClass: If you’ve seen it, please share your thoughts in the comments below

annotation.spannedText: it is not inconceivable

classMention.mentionClass: it is not inconceivable

annotation.spannedText: This may seem far-fetched and implausible to some
